Welcome to SheetSync!¶

blurb to come... this is all pre-release experimentation.

Installing¶

Install SheetSync with:

$ pip install sheetsync

Basic usage¶

SheetSync works with data in a dictionary of dictionaries. I.e. each row is represented by a dictionary, and these are themselves stored in a dictionary indexed by a row-specific key. E.g.:

To synchronize this data (add rows, update rows, delete rows) with a target spreadsheet you do this:

import sheetsync
worksheet = sheetsync.Sheet(username="yourusername@domain.com",
                            password="app-specific-password",
                            title="My auto-generated spreadsheet",
                            sheet_name="data")
worksheet.sync(data)
